SELECT MEMID , MEMPW , MEMNAME , MEMPH , EMAIL , JOINDATE
FROM MEMBERLIST WHERE MEMID = #{ memid } AND MEMPW = #{ mempw } AND LVL = 0
SELECT MEMID , MEMPW , MEMNAME , MEMPH , EMAIL , TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') JOINDATE , LVL FROM MEMBERLIST ORDER BY JOINDATE DESC
SELECT MEMID , MEMPW , MEMNAME , MEMPH , EMAIL , TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JOINDATE , LVL FROM MEMBERLIST WHERE MEMID = #{ memid }

SELECT F.FAVID , D.DRESSID , D.DRESSNAME , D.DRESSPRICE , D.DRESSIMAGE , M.MEMID , M.MEMNAME FROM MEMBERLIST M, DRESS D, FAVORITES F WHERE M.MEMID = F.MEMID AND F.DRESSID=D.DRESSID
ORDER BY F.FAVID DESC

SELECT E.ESTIID , M.MEMID , M.MEMNAME , E.ESTINAME , E.RESDATE , E.RESTIME , E.GUESTNUM , H.HALLNAME , C.CATERINGTYPE , S.STUDIONAME , D.DRESSNAME , SUM((E.GUESTNUM * C.CATERINGPRICE) + H.HALLOSPRICE + S.STUDIOPRICE + D.DRESSPRICE ) TOTALCOST FROM MEMBERLIST M, ESTIMATES E, HALL H, CATERING C, STUDIO S, DRESS D WHERE M.MEMID = E.MEMID AND H.HALLID = E.HALLID AND C.CATERINGID = E.CATERINGID AND S.STUDIOID = E.STUDIOID AND D.DRESSID = E.DRESSID
GROUP BY E.ESTIID, M.MEMID, M.MEMNAME, E.ESTINAME, E.RESDATE, E.RESTIME, E.GUESTNUM, H.HALLNAME, C.CATERINGTYPE, S.STUDIONAME, D.DRESSNAME ORDER BY E.ESTIID DESC
